world.characters

Class Character

  • java.lang.Object
    • world.Scenery
      • world.characters.Character

  • public abstract class Character
extends Scenery
    Class used to handle a character (player or non-player)

    A character can be a purely decorative character or a talking character or a player character (the hero)

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected static int CHARACTER_HEIGHT
      Height of the character's image (fixed)
      protected static int CHARACTER_WIDTH
      Width of the character's image (fixed)
      protected int posX
      Horizontal position of the character
      protected int posY
      Vertical position of the character
      protected boolean visible
      Boolean equals to true if the character is visible, false if the character is not
